title: Hanes Mens Cotton, Moisture-wicking V-neck Tee Undershirts, Multiple Packs And Colors
description: THE COMFORT OF COTTON - Starts soft and gets softer with each washing.
KEEP COOL AND DRY - Cool Comfort moisture-wicking fabric for all- day comfort.
FRESH ALL DAY - FreshIQ advanced odor protection technology fights odor-causing bacteria.
THE SIZE YOU BUY IS THE SIZE IT STAYS - Preshrunk cotton holds its size and shape, wash after wash.
FREEDOM TO MOVE - Roomy armholes and a full-cut silhouette for unrestricted movement.
NO TAG, NO ITCH - No tag to bunch up or itch.
Tagless cotton t-shirts with short sleeves and v-neckline featuring premium comfort soft cotton fabric
